text:
@SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe Was there any question about You/Nasty urging people to go to Chinatown.
Or your claim that you tore the SOTU speech because it was all lies. Yet within the speech the President spoke a out CORONAVIRUS!   You lying reckless scum.
